messages.onlyPlayer: &cSorry but only players can use this command.
messages.setup.runSetup: &cThe setup first needs to be run before you can do anything else.
messages.setup.failed: &cOops, something went wrong while finishing the setup. Please try again later.
messages.error.loadConfig: &cAn error occured while loading in the config please check the file.
messages.error.saveConfig: &cAn error occured while copying saving the config please check the file.
messages.error.copyDefaultLanguage: &cAn error occured while copying the default language file.
messages.error.noUrl: &cUrl to connect to MineMonitor is not specified please check the config.
messages.error.couldNotCreateConnection: &cCould not create a connection to the server.
messages.connection.autoConnect: &7Automatically try to reconnect when the connection is lost.
messages.connection.ssl: &7This option is required when server is pointing to main servers.
messages.setting.playTime: Send the player's playtime to the dashboard
messages.setting.tps: Send the servers current tps to the dashboard.
messages.setting.systemMonitor: Send the servers current cpu and ram usage to the dashboard.
messages.authenticate: %prefix &7Go to the website and add the server to your&7 &7account with these credentials.
messages.website.goTo: Click to go to the website.
